entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:33 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -43.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 08:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -43.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -57
Dewpoint: -47.9°C
Wind: SSE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 36.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Ice fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 56 this morning and minus 50 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 34 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 34 by morning. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 33 with temperature falling to minus 37 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 33 with temperature falling to minus 37 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
